controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The main controller of this program. Controls and notifies every action taken, except from mouse events. The controller implements Initializable.
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard

      handleResetBtn public void handleResetBtn() Resets the board, and sets all element in the array to dead, and the dead cells have the same color as the background color.

      handleStartBtn public void handleStartBtn() Starts and pauses the animation of the cells on the board.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        initialize 
         public void initialize({@link URL} location,{@link ResourceBundle} resources)

        initializes needed methods and objects to run Game of Life. The board,rules and view is initialized. see initialize for more information.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - - location of the root object.
        resources - - resources needed to localize the root object.
